title: why cant i watch 4k youtube videos on my pixel 4a?
content:
on the youtube app max resolution you can select to watch is 1080p(pixel 4a), i know that the screen is 1080p but on the chrome, if you use youtube in the desktop mode you can watch 4k videos, on my friends iPhone 11 his youtube app lets him play 4k videos, iphone 11's resolution not even 1080p,
i dont get it why dont youtube support 4k on pixel 4a?
